name: Froggy Adventure (BUBICO)
description: Hello, i'm a beginner developer just started making games and here it is my first game made for android. Here we have our little friend Froggy and he is trying to get all of the fly's he can see to eat them. The Problem is the random garbage thrown by humankind and the bad mushrooms who are stopping him from eating all the fly's. You're job is to help him to beware from the obstacles. Good luck!!
